Martial Arts.description:
Martial Arts does not have any automation. All the benefits of the feature are hardcoded into the Unarmed Strike ability.

The cultist leader can use Dexterity instead of Strength for the attack and damage rolls of its Unarmed Strikes. It can roll a d6 in place of the normal damage of its unarmed attack. When it uses the Attack action with an Unarmed Strike on its turn, it can make one Unarmed Strike as a bonus action.

Unarmed Strike.name: Unarmed Strike
Unarmed Strike.description:
Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

The cultist attacks with its fist.

Draconic Command.name: Draconic Command
Draconic Command.description: As an action, once per short rest, the cultist leader channels the power of its draconic patron to inspire and empower its allies. For the next 1 minute, up to 5 allies of the cultist leader within 30ft who can hear it gain Multiattack.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Multiattack. The cultist makes three Unarmed Strikes.

Stillness of Mind.name: Stillness of Mind
Stillness of Mind.description: The cultist leader can use its action to end one effect on itself that is causing it to be charmed or frightened.

Bracers of Ignition.name: Bracers of Ignition
Bracers of Ignition.description:
Wondrous item, rare (requires attunement)

"There's no flame like dragonfire."

"There's no heat like dragon's breath."

"There’s no burn like dragon’s fury."

These bracers are crafted from the red scales of a young red dragon. The scales retain their innate heat, yet they are comfortable to wear.

Fiery Strikes. While wearing these bracers, your unarmed strikes and melee weapon attacks deal an additional [[/roll 1d4]] fire damage.

Scorching Eruption. Once per long rest, as an action, you can slam the bracers together to release a wave of fiery energy. All creatures within a 10ft radius must make a DC 14 Dexterity saving throw, taking [[/roll 4d6]] fire damage on a failed save, or half as much on a success.

Fiery Strikes.name: Fiery Strikes
Fiery Strikes.description: Your unarmed strikes and melee weapon attacks deal an additional 1d4 fire damage.

Vitality Beam.name: Vitality Beam
Vitality Beam.description: Vitality Beam. As an action, the Shard of Vitality emits a beam that connects it to a creature. While the Shard remains active, the creature gains 150 temporary hit points.

Shortbow.name: 短弓
Shortbow.description: This two handed bow is somewhat smaller than the traditional longbow variant, making it well suited for rapid attacks while on the move or mounted from horseback.

Quiver.name: Quiver
Quiver.description: A quiver can hold up to 20 arrows.

Arrow.name: Arrow
Arrow.description: Standard ammunition used for bows of all varieties. These mundane arrows are made of smooth wooden shafts with goose feather fletching and hammer metal bodkins.

Shortsword.name: 短剑
Shortsword.description: A medium sized blade with a firm crossguard and a leather-wrapped handle. A versatile weapon which makes up in versatility what it lacks in reach.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes two Slam attacks and uses Unsettling Visage if available.

Slam.name: Slam
Slam.description: [[/attack]] (with Advantage during the first round of each combat), reach 5 ft. [[/damage average extended]].

attack.condition: with Advantage during the first round of each combat

Unsettling Visage.name: Unsettling Visage
Unsettling Visage.description:
Wisdom Saving Throw: DC 12, each creature in a 15-foot Emanation originating from the [[lookup @name lowercase]] that can see the [[lookup @name lowercase]].

Failure: The target has the &Reference[Frightened apply=false] condition and repeats the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. After 1 minute, it succeeds automatically.

Frightened.name: Frightened
Frightened.description: The target has the &Reference[Frightened apply=false] condition and repeats the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. After 1 minute, it succeeds automatically.

Read Thoughts.name: Read Thoughts
Read Thoughts.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts Detect Thoughts, requiring no spell components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC [[lookup @abilities.cha.dc]]).

Detect Thoughts.name: 侦测思想
Detect Thoughts.description:
你激活下述效应之一。直到法术结束为止，你可以在你随后的回合用一个魔法动作以激活下述任意效应之一。

感知思想。 你感知距你 30 尺内，知晓语言或能够心灵感应的思想的存在。你并不会阅读这些思想，但你知道这里存在一名有理智的生物。

此法术会被 1 尺厚的岩石、泥土或木头，1 寸厚的金属，或薄薄一层铅阻隔。

阅读思想。 选择一名距你 30 尺内的可见生物，或一名距你 30 尺内被感知思想侦测到的生物。你了解到此时目标最关心的事情。如果目标不知晓任何语言也不会心灵感应，则你不能得到任何信息。

在你的下一回合，用一个魔法动作，你可以尝试深入目标的心灵。如果你选择这么做，目标进行一次感知豁免。豁免失败，则你了解到他的逻辑推理、情绪状态以及他头脑中的一些大事（比如忧虑、挚爱和仇恨的事物）。豁免成功，法术终止。无论哪种情况，目标都会知道你正在窥探其心灵，且直到你的注意力从它的心灵上移开为止，目标均可以在其回合内使用动作进行一次 [[/check ability=int skill=arc dc=@attributes.spelldc]] 检定，对抗你的法术豁免DC，目标胜出对抗时，法术终止。

Shape-Shift.name: Shape-Shift
Shape-Shift.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] shape-shifts into a Medium or Smaller Humanoid, or it returns to its true form. Its game statistics, other than its size, are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed.

Note: To revert to the original form, either:

  • target your own token and use the ability,

  • use the ability with no target selected,

  • or use the ability on the same target into which you previously transformed.

When shapeshifting, the following token properties are copied from the target: token image, token disposition, and token ring.

When reverting, the original token properties are restored from the Prototype Token. If you wish to customize the default appearance or settings of the token, make sure to update its Prototype Token as well.

Resistance Beam.name: Resistance Beam
Resistance Beam.description: Resistance Beam. As an action, the Shard of Protection emits a beam of energy linking it to a creature. While the Shard is active, the creature gains resistance to Bludgeoning and Thunder damage.

The Flame Tyrant CR6.name: The Flame Tyrant CR6
The Flame Tyrant CR6.description:
The Flame Tyrant Quotes

  1. "I am the Flame Tyrant, and my rule shall scorch the world's pages with tales of my glory!"

  2. "Fire cleanses, purifies, and destroys. You think yourselves strong enough to command it? Let us test your resolve."

  3. "Extinguish my flames? Foolish mortals. My flames are eternal, as is my dominion over them. You will burn or bow."

  4. "Negotiate? There is but one negotiation: my will or your demise. What could you possibly offer that matches the power of fire?"

  5. "My flames are eternal, my power unyielding. Bow or burn."

  6. "The inferno that courses through me cannot be tamed by mortals. I am a living testament to fire's supremacy."

  7. "Ah, the ants dare to challenge the Flame Tyrant himself. Your defiance shall be a testament to the power of the inferno!"

  8. "Knowledge, you say? Power's true nature lies in wielding it, not in understanding it. But if you seek power, then face me and prove your worth."

Pyro Head - The Infernal Crown.name: Pyro Head - The Infernal Crown
Pyro Head - The Infernal Crown.description:
Wondrous Item, very rare (requires attunement by a fighter, sorcerer, wizard, warlock or rogue)

"There is a fire inside. Watch the flames, the ancient, flickering of the relic's essence and become reborn."

The Infernal Crown, known also as the Pyro Head, is a relic forged in the heart of a extinguished volcano. The helm resembles a skull engulfed in flames.

Ember Gaze. As an action, you can unleash a gaze attack from the Pyro Head. Three rays shoot forth from the helm's eyes and mouth, targeting the nearest three creatures within a 30-foot cone. Each targeted creature must make a Dexterity saving throw (DC 15). On a failed save, the creature takes 4d6 fire damage. On a successful save, they take half damage. If a creature dies from this attack, you gain temporary hit points equal to the damage the creature took.

This ability can be use twice per long rest.

Inferno Barrier. You are immune to environmental heat damage and resistant to any fire-based attacks or spells.

Intimidating Aura. You gain a +5 bonus to Intimidation checks and a -5 penalty to Persuasion checks.

Curse. When the Infernal Crown is donned, the helm fuses with you, becoming unremovable. During this time, your head takes the appearance of a burning skull, wreathed in fire (the fire is harmless and does not emit heat and light). The helm cannot be removed as long as you live.

Pyro Head.description:

Flame Shield.name: Flame Shield
Flame Shield.description: Flame Shield. As a bonus action, The Flame Tyrant creates a shield of fire around himself. Until the spell ends, any creature within 5 feet that hits him with a melee attack takes 1d8 fire damage.

Molten Resurgence.name: Molten Resurgence
Molten Resurgence.description: Molten Resurgence (1/Long Rest). As a bonus action, the Flame Tyrant can submerge himself into a pool of lava or magma and regain hit points equal to half of his max current hit point total.

Pyroblast.name: Pyroblast
Pyroblast.description: Pyroblast. As an action, The Flame Tyrant can target a creature within 120ft that it can see. The creature must make a Dexterity saving throw or take 2d8 fire damage. On a failed save, the target is also set ablaze, taking an additional 1d4 fire damage at the start of each of its turns until it takes an action to extinguish the flames.

Infernal Explosion.description: Infernal Explosion (Recharge 5-6). The Flame Tyrant casts a fireball at a point he can see within range. Each creature in a 20-foot-radius sphere centered on that point must make a Dexterity saving throw. A creature takes 8d6 fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

Inferno Wave.name: Inferno Wave
Inferno Wave.description: Inferno Wave (Recharge 5-6). As an action, the Flame Tyrant slams the ground, causing waves of intense heat to ripple outward, igniting the ground with flames that persist for 1 minute. All creatures within a 15-foot radius, as well as any creature that enters the area for the duration, must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature becomes vulnerable to fire damage for as long as it remains in the area. A creature that successfully saves is not affected by the vulnerability.

If any of this spell's area overlaps with an area of light created by a spell of 2nd level or lower, the spell that created the light is dispelled.

Faerie Fire.name: Faerie Fire
Faerie Fire.description:
Each object in a 20-foot cube within range is outlined in blue, green, or violet light (your choice). Any creature in the area when the spell is cast is also outlined in light if it fails a Dexterity saving throw. For the duration, objects and affected creatures shed dim light in a 10-foot radius.

Any attack roll against an affected creature or object has advantage if the attacker can see it, and the affected creature or object can't benefit from being invisible.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Multiattack. The [[lookup @name upercase]] makes three attacks, either with its longsword or its longbow. It can replace one of those attacks with a bite attack.

Unarmored Defense.name: Unarmored Defense
Unarmored Defense.description:
The masked cultist AC is automatically calculated using the "Unarmored Defense (Monk)" setting on the character sheet. If armor is added to the cultist leader, the GM will need to manually adjust the AC.

While the masked cultist is wearing no armor and wielding no shield, its AC includes its Wisdom modifier.

Unarmed Strike.name: Unarmed Strike
Unarmed Strike.description:
Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d4 + 3) bludgeoning damage.

The cultist attacks with its fist.

Martial Arts.name: Martial Arts
Martial Arts.description:
Martial Arts does not have any automation. All the benefits of the feature are hardcoded into the Unarmed Strike ability.

The masked cultist can use Dexterity instead of Strength for the attack and damage rolls of its Unarmed Strikes. It can roll a d4 in place of the normal damage of its Unarmed Strike. When it uses the Attack action with an Unarmed Strike on its turn, it can make one Unarmed Strike as a bonus action.

Bracers of Ignition.name: Bracers of Ignition
Bracers of Ignition.description:
Wondrous item, uncommon (requires attunement)

"There's no flame like dragonfire."

"There's no heat like dragon's breath."

"There’s no burn like dragon’s fury."

These bracers are crafted from the red scales of a young red dragon. The scales retain their innate heat, yet they are comfortable to wear.

Fiery Strikes. While wearing these bracers, your unarmed strikes and melee weapon attacks deal an additional [[/roll 1d4]] fire damage.
